column2: Create epic space battles between fleets of ships and watch the carnage unfold.
Create epic space battles between fleets of ships and watch the carnage unfold.
You have unlimited resources to build any ship you want
Build a flight-ready ship in Creative Mode to unlock
You are free to persue any career at your own pace. No anomaly, no stargate.
Embark on a new journey through our story-driven sci-fi episodes
Your aim is to research and build a stargate to Andromeda
Complete any story episode in 'Boldly Go' to unlock
Stay one step ahead of a devastating anomaly, for as long as you can
Forge your own path through story driven episodes all around the sector, and take part in the construction of a galactic mega project
Take part in the construction of a galactic megaproject - a STARGATE with enough range to reach our nearest neighbouring galaxy ANDROMEDA
Stay one step ahead of a devastating anomaly that consumes everything in its path, and save as many as you can before it's too late
